Html:
When using NetOffice, Outlook plugins are no longer identified as "first class citizens" in Outlook. Every 10 minutes, I get this prompt when my plugin tries to access data from Outlook:

http://i40.tinypic.com/machut.png

(It asks for permission to access data, and the maximum time interval to grant access for is 10 minutes).

Do you happen to have a workaround for this?

NetOffice gives you a workarround here with the DeveloperToolbox

http://netoffice.codeplex.com/wikipage?title=OutlookSecurity_English

hope this helps*
Sebastian
